title: aeplots
text: vignette documents use functions aeplots create tables plots analysing adverse event data clinical trials.
code: library(aeplots)

title: aeplots
text: generate tables plots summarise adverse events clinical trials, R package requires input dataset data frame format. sample dataset two treatment arms shown : need convert body_system_class severity columns factors. Note functions , need specify column names corresponding variable needed unless rename column names dataset default column names specified sample dataset documentation. refer detailed documentation function typing:
code: data(df2) head(df2, 10) df2$aebodsys <- as.factor(df2$aebodsys) # for severity to be presented in ascending order, we order the levels df2$severity <- ordered(df2$severity, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe")) help(aetable)

title: aeplots
text: functions aetable, aeseverity, aestacked aebar can take 4 treatment arms. sample dataset 3 treatment arms:
code: data(df3) head(df3, 10) df3$aebodsys <- as.factor(df3$aebodsys) df3$severity <- ordered(df2$severity, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

title: aeplots
text: aetable plots table AE summary body system class arm. contains total number participants risk per arm (\(N_{1}\), \(N_{2}\)), frequency (N), proportion (%), total number events (n), incidence rate (IR), number adverse events per participant (mean & SD) treatment effect estimate (IRR) 95% confidence interval (CI). include additional covariates besides arm generalised linear model Poisson function log link, specify vector variable names variables argument.  can specify number decimal places proportions, IR, mean SD columns well number significant figures IRR 95% CI.  can choose drop IRR 95% CI specifying IRR=FALSE.  can also choose drop mean column specifying mean=FALSE.
code: aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("variable1", "variable2")) aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("variable1", "variable2"), proportions_dp=2, IR_dp=2, mean_dp=2, SD_dp=2, IRR_sf=4, CI_sf=4) aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=FALSE) aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=FALSE, mean=FALSE)

title: aeplots
text: aetable include IRRs 95% CIs datasets 2 treatment arms. change labels control interventions table, specify label control argument control_name specify intervention labels argument intervention_names. Note intervention_names specified using order interventions specified intervention_levels.
code: aetable(df3, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", control_name="No Drug", intervention_levels=c("Intervention 1", "Intervention 2"), intervention_names=c("Drug A", "Drug B"))

title: aeplots
text: aeseverity plots table frequencies proportions events severity categories. specify number decimal places proportions via argument proportions_dp.
code: aeseverity(df2, arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), proportions_dp=2)

title: aeplots
code: aeseverity(df3, arm_levels=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Placebo"), arm_names=c("Drug A","Drug B", "No Drug"))

title: aeplots
text: aedot plots dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval visualise AE harm profiles two-arm randomised controlled trials.
code: aedot(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention="Intervention")

title: aeplots
text: aestacked plots stacked bar chart proportions body system class arm maximum severity. severity ordered, required specify levels severity ascending order argument severity_levels.  can change colour severity specifying vector colour codes corresponding severity level severity_colours argument.
code: aestacked(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe")) aestacked(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"), severity_colours=c("#D0EE11", "#48B5C4", "#115F9A"))

title: aeplots
code: aestacked(df3, body_system_class="aebodsys", arm_levels=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Placebo"), arm_names=c("Drug A","Drug B", "No Drug"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

title: aeplots
text: aebar plots bar chart number events reported per participant.  can change colour representing treatment arm specifying vector colour codes arm_colours argument according order arm levels specified arm_levels argument.
code: aebar(df2, arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), facets=FALSE) aebar(df2, arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), arm_colours=c("#FFB55A", "#B2E061"), facets=FALSE)

title: aeplots
text: can plot bar chart treatment arm separate facets specifying facets=TRUE.
code: aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Placebo"), arm_names=c("Drug A","Drug B", "No Drug"), facets=FALSE) aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Placebo"), arm_names=c("Drug A","Drug B", "No Drug"), facets=TRUE)

title: aeplots
text: can save tables docx specifying filepath save_docx_path argument.
code: aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("variable1", "variable2"), save_docx_path="table.docx")

title: aeplots
text: can save tables plots images specifying filepath save_image_path argument.
code: aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Placebo"), arm_names=c("Drug A","Drug B", "No Drug"), facets=TRUE, save_image_path="image.png") #> Saving 8 x 6 in image

title: Authors and Citation
text: Xiao Xuan Tan. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Tan X (2023). aeplots: Create Tables Plots Analysing Adverse Event Data Clinical Trials. R package version 0.1.0, https://txx4986.github.io/aeplots/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aeplots: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials},   author = {Xiao Xuan Tan},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://txx4986.github.io/aeplots/}, }

what: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: R package create tables plots analysing adverse event data clinical trials

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: can install aeplots : Please refer devtools documentation instructions set working development environment install devtools depending platform.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("https://github.com/txx4986/aeplots.git")

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: Functions available package: aetable: Plots table AE summary body system class aeseverity: Plots table AE summary severity aedot: Plots dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval give overview harm profile aestacked: Plots stacked bar chart present proportions participants event arm maximum severity aebar: Plots bar chart present number events reported per participant see detailed documentation function:
code: help(aetable) ?aetable

what: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
text: Bar chart number events reported per participant

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
code: aebar(   data,   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   arm_levels = c("A1", "A2", "A3", "A4"),   arm_names = NULL,   arm_colours = NULL,   facets = TRUE,   save_image_path = NULL )

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
text: data data frame adverse_event, id arm columns id name id column arm name arm column arm_levels vector factor levels arm variable arm_names vector names arm arm variable arm_colours vector colours arm facets logical value whether plot bar chart facets save_image_path file path save bar chart image

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
text: Bar chart presenting number events reported per participant

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
code: aebar(df2, arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), facets=FALSE)

what: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
title: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
text: Dot plot visualise AE harm profiles two-arm randomised controlled trials

title: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
code: aedot(   data,   body_system_class = "body_system_class",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   control = "C",   intervention = "I",   save_image_path = NULL )

title: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
text: data data frame adverse_event, body_system_class, id arm columns body_system_class name body_system_class column id name id column arm name arm column control factor level control arm intervention factor level intervention arm save_image_path file path save dot plot image

title: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
text: dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval

title: Dot plot to visualise AE and harm profiles in two-arm randomised controlled trials — aedot
code: df2$aebodsys <- as.factor(df2$aebodsys) aedot(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention="Intervention") #> Bin width defaults to 1/30 of the range of the data. Pick better value with #> `binwidth`.

what: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
title: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
text: Table frequencies proportions events severity categories

title: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
code: aeseverity(   data,   arm_levels,   severity = "severity",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   arm_names = NULL,   proportions_dp = 1,   save_image_path = NULL,   save_docx_path = NULL )

title: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
text: data data frame adverse event, severity, id arm columns arm_levels vector factor levels arm variable severity name severity column id name id column arm name arm column arm_names vector names arm arm variable proportions_dp number decimal places proportions save_image_path file path save table image save_docx_path file path save table docx

title: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
text: flextable frequencies proportions events severity categories

title: Table of frequencies and proportions of events by severity categories — aeseverity
code: df2$severity <- ordered(df2$severity, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe")) aeseverity(df2, arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), proportions_dp=2)

what: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
title: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
text: Stacked bar chart proportions body system class arm maximum severity

title: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
code: aestacked(   data,   body_system_class = "body_system_class",   severity = "severity",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   arm_levels = c("A1", "A2", "A3", "A4"),   arm_names = NULL,   severity_levels = NULL,   severity_colours = NULL,   save_image_path = NULL )

title: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
text: data data frame adverse_event, body_system_class, severity, id arm columns body_system_class name body_system_class column severity name severity column id name id column arm name arm column arm_levels vector factor levels arm variable arm_names vector names arm arm variable severity_levels vector level severity ascending order severity ordered factor severity_colours vector colours level severity ascending order save_image_path file path save stacked bar chart plot image

title: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
text: stacked bar chart presenting proportions participants event arm maximum severity

title: Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity — aestacked
code: df2$aebodsys <- as.factor(df2$aebodsys) df2$severity <- ordered(df2$severity, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe")) aestacked(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

what: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: aetable used plot table AE summary body system class arm using following summary statistics: Total number participants risk per arm Frequency (number participants least one event event) Proportions (number participants least one event body system class relative number participants risk) Number adverse events per participant: presented counts, mean (SD) Total number events incidence rates (number events relative total time follow-) Treatment effect estimate (IRR) 95% confidence intervals

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
code: aetable(   data,   control,   intervention_levels,   body_system_class = "body_system_class",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   date_rand = "date_rand",   last_visit = "last_visit",   control_name = NULL,   intervention_names = NULL,   IRR = TRUE,   variables = c(),   mean = TRUE,   proportions_dp = 1,   IR_dp = 1,   mean_dp = 1,   SD_dp = 1,   IRR_sf = 3,   CI_sf = 3,   save_image_path = NULL,   save_docx_path = NULL )

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: data data frame adverse_event, body_system_class, id, arm, date_rand last_visit columns control factor level control arm intervention_levels vector factor levels interventions body_system_class name body_system_class column id name id column arm name arm column date_rand name date_rand column last_visit name last_visit column control_name name control arm intervention_names vector names interventions IRR logical value whether include IRR 95% CI column summary table (2 arms) variables vector variable names included glm Poisson model computation IRR (excluding arm) mean logical value whether include mean SD column summary table proportions_dp number decimal places proportions IR_dp number decimal places incidence rate mean_dp number decimal places mean number AEs per participant SD_dp number decimal places standard deviation number AEs per participant IRR_sf number significant figures IRR CI_sf number significant figures 95% CI save_image_path file path save table image save_docx_path file path save table docx

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: flextable AE summary body system class arm

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
code: df2$aebodsys <- as.factor(df2$aebodsys) aetable(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Intervention"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("variable1", "variable2"))
